data.name: Hat Hunters
data.detailed_description:
Hat Hunters is a local multiplayer party game for 2 - 4 players. Each player controls one character amongst identically looking players and AIs.
Your goal is to collect as many stars as possible or steal them from other players by shooting collectable items at them.
Don't attract too much attention when pursuing your goals or you can easily be distinguished from the AI characters, which will make you the main target of the other players.

Challenge your friends in a variety of modes and maps. Choose between a quick match or a longer battle in the daytime or the extra suspenseful midnight theme.

Features:
- 5 Game Modes
- 8 Maps
- 7 Exclusive Hats
- Easy to learn two action control
- For 2 - 4 players (up to 2 keyboard controls available)

data.short_description: Hat Hunters is a local multiplayer party game for 2 - 4 players. Each player controls one character amongst identically looking players and AIs. Try to find your way towards victory without attracting too much attention or you will be the main target of all Hat Hunters.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Минимальные:
  • ОС: Windows 7 or later
  • Процессор: 2.0GHz
  • Оперативная память: 512 MB ОЗУ
  • Видеокарта: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities.
  • DirectX: Версии 10
  • Место на диске: 200 MB
  • Дополнительно: For more than 2 players, gamepads are required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Рекомендованные:
  • ОС: Windows 7 or later
  • Процессор: 2.4GHz
  • Оперативная память: 1 GB ОЗУ
  • Видеокарта: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities.
  • DirectX: Версии 11
  • Место на диске: 300 MB

mac_requirements.minimum:
Минимальные:
  • ОС: 10.9 or later
  • Процессор: 2.0GHz
  • Оперативная память: 512 MB ОЗУ
  • Видеокарта: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities.
  • Место на диске: 200 MB
  • Дополнительно: For more than 2 players, gamepads are required

  • Оперативная память: 1 GB ОЗУ
  • Видеокарта: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities.
  • Место на диске: 300 MB
  • Дополнительно: For more than 2 players, gamepads are required

linux_requirements.minimum:
Минимальные:
  • ОС: glibc 2.15+, 32/64-bit
  • Оперативная память: 512 MB ОЗУ
  • Место на диске: 200 MB
  • Дополнительно: For more than 2 players, gamepads are required
linux_requirements.recommended:
Рекомендованные:
  • ОС: glibc 2.15+, 64-bit
  • Оперативная память: 1 GB ОЗУ
  • Место на диске: 300 MB
  • Дополнительно: For more than 2 players, gamepads are required
